DOC.brief_summary: The investigators aim to experimentally manipulate presence of questions on positive or negative affective attitudes to see if including these moderate as intention to become an organ donor. The methodology will be replicated across three international sites (RCSI Dublin, RCSI Bahrain, RCSI Perdana University).
DOC.brief_title: Investigating Affective Attitude Question-behaviour Effects on Intention to Become an Organ Donor
